title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 185.3 - Business records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 185.3 - Business records

State Regulations

Each licensee shall retain and maintain for a period of
three years records of the following transactions related to the armored car
carrier business: employee hiring and termination records, records of all
training, and contracts for the provision of armored car services and related
documents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
185.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
